<a id="class_BoxOccluder3D"></a>

# BoxOccluder3D

**Inherits:** [Occluder3D](class_occluder3d.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Cuboid shape for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D](class_occluderinstance3d.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**BoxOccluder3D** stores a cuboid shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system.

See [OccluderInstance3D](class_occluderinstance3d.md)'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Occlusion culling](../tutorials/3d/occlusion_culling.md)
